Uses of Class
io.amcp.core.DeliveryOptions

  • Packages that use DeliveryOptions 
    Package Description
    io.amcp.core  

    • Uses of DeliveryOptions in io.amcp.core

      Fields in io.amcp.core declared as DeliveryOptions 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DeliveryOptions DeliveryOptions.DEFAULT
      Default delivery options: no acknowledgment required, fire-and-forget mode.
      static DeliveryOptions DeliveryOptions.HIGH_PRIORITY
      High priority delivery options for control messages.
      static DeliveryOptions DeliveryOptions.RELIABLE
      Reliable delivery options: acknowledgment required, at-least-once delivery.
      Methods in io.amcp.core that return DeliveryOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DeliveryOptions DeliveryOptions.Builder.build()

      DeliveryOptions DeliveryOptions.withDeliveryMode(DeliveryOptions.DeliveryMode deliveryMode)
      Creates a new DeliveryOptions with modified delivery mode.
      DeliveryOptions DeliveryOptions.withMaxRetries(int maxRetries)
      Creates a new DeliveryOptions with modified max retries.
      DeliveryOptions DeliveryOptions.withPriority(int priority)
      Creates a new DeliveryOptions with modified priority.
      DeliveryOptions DeliveryOptions.withRequireAcknowledgment(boolean requireAck)
      Creates a new DeliveryOptions with modified acknowledgment requirement.
      DeliveryOptions DeliveryOptions.withTimeout(Duration timeout)
      Creates a new DeliveryOptions with modified timeout.
      Methods in io.amcp.core with parameters of type DeliveryOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Event.Builder Event.Builder.deliveryOptions(DeliveryOptions options) 
      default CompletableFuture<Void> Agent.publishEvent(String topic, Object payload, DeliveryOptions options)
      Publishes an event with delivery options.
